https://tmrev.io/movie/379535-Chayilyam 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t8heYQNEc6zhCmw20rbyHsThjvD.jpg Chayilyam is a Malayalam language film written and directed by Manoj Kana. The story is about the plight of a hapless widow, who is denied the freedom to lead a normal life by the society. The film was produced with contributions from more than 2,000 individuals and released in theatres in February 2014. Chayilyam
